definition: Tian Liang (1979-), former male Chinese diver, Olympic medalist
surname Tian
field/farm/CL:片[pian4]
bright/clear/resonant/to shine/to show/to reveal

sentences.english: Tian did not apologize for his alleged infraction.
sentences.chinese: 田亮没有为他所谓的违反规定而道歉。

sentences.english: Ikeda currently lives and works in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 池田亮司现在生活和工作在巴黎。

sentences.english: Tianliang is the most likely sportsman to be the champion.
sentences.chinese: 田亮是最有希望成为冠军的运动员。

sentences.english: The Olympic diving champion Tian Liang is the only person I admire.
sentences.chinese: 奥运冠军田亮才是我所佩服的人。

sentences.english: Tian will be unable to represent China in the Beijing Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 田亮将不能代表中国参与北京奥运会。

sentences.english: It is possible for Tian to be a member of the national team again.
sentences.chinese: 田亮再一次成为国家队的一员是可能的。
